title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The bug report is about a dynamic text element's Content Type property not having any effect. The expected behavior is different for different content types.
OB: When the dynamic text element's Content Type property is set to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report displays the same results.
EB:
The expected behavior is as follows:
- For Plain content type, I expect the literal content (tags and all) to be displayed.
- For Auto content type, I expect content 1, 2, and 3 to appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML content type, I expect content 1 and 2 to appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 to appear literally with RTF tags.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the attached report.
2. Locate the dynamic text element.
3. Set the Content Type property to Auto.
4. Observe the display results.
5. Repeat steps 3-4 with Content Type set to Plain and HTML.
